text:
Hey team, looking to work with Quinn Richardson for Red Rooster. Budget is approx $6,237 - need 1 x Facebook story, 1 x Pinterest pin, 3 x 15-second TikTok. 8 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engagement. Usage: 12 months. Start date: January 2026. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $6,237 budget

Need to confirm: usage rights
